sense.def:
Z izrazom
though
uvedemo dejstvo ali komentar, ki je v nasprotju z neko drugo izjavo ali zaradi katerega se ta druga izjava lahko zdi presenetljiva.

seg.quote: She wore a fur coat, even though it was a very hot day.
Though he hadn't stopped working all day, he wasn't tired.
‘It's not very useful.’—‘It's pretty, though, isn't it ?’
